pages.text: This filter allows for matching of items by the mod they belong to. Up to 6 mods can be added per installed filter.$(li)$(thing)Right-click/$ the filter to open its GUI (or $(thing)middle-click/$ / press $(bold)$(4)[$(k:modularrouters.configure)]/$ on a filter which is installed in a module).

$(li)Drop any item into the item slot in the top-left corner of the GUI. The item's mod name will be displayed to the right. Click the $(bold)$(2)+/$ button to add it to the mod list below.$(li)Click the red $(bold)$(4)X/$ button beside an entry to remove that mod from the list.$(p)Vanilla items can be added too, and their "mod" will be shown as $(italic)Minecraft/$.
